tossup_question: 12) BIOLOGY  What general class of animal tissue is characterized by the presence of collagen?
bonus_question: 12) BIOLOGY  Luke Skywalker is looking for evidence about whether Darth Vader was his father. Luke has blood type A, and medical records show that his mother had blood type AB. What are all the possible blood types that Luke’s father could be?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: TYPES A, B, O, AB (SAYING “TYPES” IS NOT NECESSARY)
